Gaurav Singh Index

Hardware Sketching Workshop by Dr.Tomas Sokoler, Professor from IT University of Copenhagen

2013-09-07 / Understanding

S.labs, Bangalore (2-7 September, 2013)

Hardware sketching is very essential to build technology stuff, it allows the designer to learn the representation and designing process of building things without actually requiring engineering support. Tomas rightly captured the essence of sketching in his workshop presentation and it helped me in understanding the importance of hardware sketching before prototyping. The difference between sketching and prototyping is very significant and very important to showcase the process of building things. Over the week, he introduced us to Arduino programming and building internet of things with the help of Arduino Uno, WiFi shields and lots of different kind of sensors and actuators.
